section2.aboutUsDescription: The United Cement Industrial a Saudi Company was established in 2013 under the commercial number (4030256672). United Cement industrial company owns the latest factory that was recently built in Saudi Arabia and in the Western Region and close to Makkah. The Production capacity is 2 millions tones of cement per year that will meet the needs of our customers
section2.msgCeoDescription: United Cement Industrial Company  (UCIC) had the privilege to be supported by the Government of the Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques, by gaining a concession building permit in Al Lith city to manufacture different types of cement that matches the Global…

product_1.title: PORTLAND POZZOLANA CEMENT (PPC)
product_1.description: Portland Pozzolana Cement is a kind of Blended Cement which is produced by inter-grinding of OPC clinker along with gypsum and pozzolanic materials in certain proportions.

product_2.title: SULPHATE RESISTANT CEMENT (SRC)
product_2.description: SULPHATE RESISTANT CEMENT (SRC) is a kind of Blended Cement which is produced by inter-grinding of OPC clinker along with gypsum and pozzolanic materials in certain proportions.

product_3.title: ORDINARY PORTLAND CEMENT (OPC)
product_3.description: ORDINARY PORTLAND CEMENT (OPC) is a kind of Blended Cement which is produced by inter-grinding of OPC clinker along with gypsum and pozzolanic materials in certain proportions.

product_4.title: TAMEER FINISHING CEMENT (TFC)
product_4.description: TAMEER FINISHING CEMENT (TFC) is a kind of Blended Cement which is produced by inter-grinding of OPC clinker along with gypsum and pozzolanic materials in certain proportions.

section4.title: NEWS
section4.description: UCIC decided to select the best machinaries with high quality and safety. thus, all major equipments are european origin. The whole plant is operated from one control room an auto mode without human intervention except in rare cases

section6.title: Saudization
section6.description: Strategy of United Cement based in employment on the serious investment in the national manpower, and through a number of foundations and programs including:

saudiPriority.title: Saudi Priority
saudiPriority.description: UCIC in its employment policies is committed to give a priority in the recruitment to talented Saudi citizens.

specialNeeds.title: Special Needs
specialNeeds.description: As a part of its social responsibility, UCIC is giving a number of special needs employment opportunities and try to prepare the appropriate environment for them from health and social prospectives, in order to enable them to actively participate in the company success.

partnershipTechnical.title: Partnership with technical institute to attract graduate
partnershipTechnical.description: UCIC is investing in long-term strategic relationship with a number of technical and vocational colleges in Makkah Region, and participating in annual career fairs to secure its needs of qualified cadres.

maintainingHighest.title: Maintaining Highest Saudization Percentage
maintainingHighest.description: UCIC has maintained since its inception a high Saudization Percentage (not less than 65% of total company employees), UCIC aims to increase Saudization percentage to be aligned with its strategic direction into investment in the Saudi youth which enable the company since its inception to maintain a platinum range in the Nationalization.

section1.commercialNumber: The United Cement Industrial a Saudi Company was established in 2013 under the commercial number (4030256672). United Cement industrial company owns the latest factory that was recently built in Saudi Arabia and in the Western Region and close to Makkah. The Production capacity is 2 million tonnes of cement annually that will meet the needs of our customers.
section1.description: United Cement Industrial Company (UCIC) proudly operates under the support of the Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques, with a concession building permit in Al Lith to produce high-quality cement that meets global standards. The company ensures an adequate fuel supply based on global performance indicators. With a strong sense of national duty, UCIC prioritizes employing and working with citizens—whether as employees, contractors, or suppliers—and boasts nearly 100% Saudi leadership since its establishment in 2013. We take pride in being platinum-ranked and in fostering development through continuous training locally and globally, believing that human resources are key to progress. Aligned with Vision 2030, UCIC focuses on efficiency and competitiveness in all technical and administrative operations. We pray for continued success to contribute to the nation's growth and development.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Aiming to be the most efficient and effective cement producer in Saudi Arabia, we focus on optimizing operations and adopting innovative practices to enhance quality.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Creating additional values in Saudi Cement Industry through innovative and sustainable using of the natural resources in order to serve our society and our Customers

section3.title: CORE VALUES
section3.description: The company aimed to create a supportive environment that offers employees prestige and gratitude, which enables them to release energies and bring out capabilities. Our human resources department is working in framework of a set of values; the most important ones included are:

ownership.title: Ownership
ownership.description: All of us in the United Cement Company are dealing with a sense of “owners”, and we are treated accordingly.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Conserving conﬁdentiality and professionalism, in addition to treating others in respect, honesty and equity.

accountability.title: Accountability
accountability.description: We bear the personal and professional responsibility of results of our works, in association with keeping up the high-level performance.

teamwork.title: Teamwork spirit
teamwork.description: Honest and trust worthy communicating, with constructive spirit and methodology that supports exchange of thoughts and resources.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Encouraging and embracing the real change, seeking distinguish and improvement knowledge and skills.

section1.title: Saudization
section1.description: Strategy of United Cement based in employment on the serious investment in the national manpower, and through a number of foundations and programs including:

saudizationPoints.title: Saudi Priority
saudizationPoints.description: UCIC in its employment policies is committed to give a priority in the recruitment to talented Saudi citizens.

saudizationPoints.title: Special Needs
saudizationPoints.description: As a part of its social responsibility, UCIC is giving a number of special needs employment opportunities and try to prepare the appropriate environment for them from health and social prospectives, in order to enable them to actively participate in the company success.

saudizationPoints.title: Partnership with technical institute to attract graduate
saudizationPoints.description: UCIC is investing in long-term strategic relationship with a number of technical and vocational colleges in Makkah Region, and participating in annual career fairs to secure its needs of qualified cadres.

saudizationPoints.title: Maintaining Highest Saudization Percentage
saudizationPoints.description: UCIC has maintained since its inception a high Saudization Percentage (not less than 65% of total company employees), UCIC aims to increase Saudization percentage to be aligned with its strategic direction into investment in the Saudi youth which enable the company since its inception to maintain a platinum range in the Nationalization.

section2.title: Training
section2.description: UCIC believes that its success is largely dependent in the ﬁrst place on how efﬁcient and professional is its workforce, so it is consistently providing its employees with a package of internal and external training programs designed to upgrade their knowledge and skills in a way that helps them to live up to the highest standards of technical and administrative performance expected, UCIC training strategy in includes number of initiatives from:

trainingPoints.title: On site training
trainingPoints.description: The company is providing an equipped training facility in its factory site in Tafel, which offers different courses in: computer, English, technical and administrative training in order to contribute in the development and the improvement of the workforce skills, the training will be extended to reach the people of the province and give them the opportunity to enhance their professional capabilities.

trainingPoints.title: External training programs
trainingPoints.description: Where the company sends its staff to specialized training centers inside and outside the Kingdom, so as to increase their knowledge and improve their skills in various fields of technical training, such as (for Electricity Mechanics - Production - Safety - precision machining, etc.) so that it includes theoretical training and field.

trainingPoints.title: The Orientation Program
trainingPoints.description: This program is designed to enhance the work behavior desired in UCIC environment, the program includes the initial basic information about the job specification as well as UCIC in general polices such as: company vision and mission - internal regulations - Organizational structure - training programs - career programs -Compensation and benefits and others.

trainingPoints.title: Attendance of internal and external conferences
trainingPoints.description: UCIC is sending number of its employees to attend local, regional and international conferences in the cement industry, in order to take advantage of opportunities to learn new and both regional and global best practices. As give the participants the opportunity to meet number of the industry experts locally and internationally.

trainingPoints.title: Cement companies field visits
trainingPoints.description: UCIC organizes number of periodic visits to cement factories in KSA, the program is designed to give the participant the opportunities to see the industry practice, during these visits, a number of workshops is to be held to document and discuss the most important insights.

trainingPoints.title: Internal training programs
trainingPoints.description: UCIC with the help of its senior employees is designing number of internal programs as to be given to the junior colleagues and the fresh employees in the company. The aim of such programs are to promote the knowledge transfer to the newly appointed staff in the company, and the main focus of the training is to develop daily operational business skills such as: problem solving, and improving the analytical capabilities as well as other skills...

section1.title: Social Resposibilities
section1.description: Seeking company strives to be a party contributor in all social initiatives that serve the region and the events, such as the continued support of education, cultural and social activities in the region in addition to the posts of local and international conferences.

section2.title: Environmental Protection
section2.description: The factory was established on latest cement industry technology as well as the pursuit of the United Cement industrial Company since the beginning of production to achieve the highest environmental standard for the environment. The company launched many environmental initiatives that contributes in creating clean environment, including:

environmentalPoints.point: The Factory is designed to be heating tower with six stages, which reduce energy consumption and fossil fuel
Planting thousands of trees in the factory
Using processed sewage water for plants and cooling
Using the solar energy for lighting some factory roads.

section1.title: What is cement
section1.description1: Cement is hydraulic binder, i.e a finely ground inorganic material which, when mixed with water, forms a paste which set and hardens by means of hydration reactions and processes and which after hardening , retains its strength and stability even under water.
section1.description2: The United Cement Company is characterized by the production of high-quality cement products and the raw materials does not contain anything of all the impurities that have a direct impact on cement products including alkali, Chlorides, Sulphates, Potassium and Sodium in addition to the company quarry is located in part of Sarawat Mountains that are known of its high-quality raw materials. In addition, there is an automated monitors of production line which takes 100 samples a day to make sure that the products have high quality, the company assures it is high quality by sending products to local & international institutes to confirm it is high quality.

products.title: Ordinary Portland Cement
products.description: Portland cement (often referred to as OPC, from Ordinary Portland Cement) is the most common type of cement in general use around the world,
products.application: Mixes ordinary reinforced concrete, which does not require special types of cement that need to withstand high strength.

products.title: Portland Pozzolana Cement
products.description: Portland Pozzolana Cement is a kind of Blended Cement which is produced by inter-grinding of OPC clinker along with gypsum and pozzolanic materials in certain proportions.
products.application: This type of cement distinct because of its specifications differ from other types of cement is made up of (70% -80%) Portland cement plus (15-20%) Pozzolana a black (volcanic) materials hundred percent natural silicon and aluminum, taken from volcanic mountains not directly exposed to any interactions or chemical additives therefore advised to use where there is any damage or disadvantages of the various uses and which gives it self great value advanced.
examples: Factories of all kinds of Bricks Block.
Concrete pipe exposed to water with a high percentage of Sulphate (water marshes and sewage)
Small Bridges which is constructed to control the flood water in areas where the soil contains a high concentration of free Sulphate and silica.
characteristics: Plays a role in making the mixture of cement, elastic and flexible (interior and exterior finishes).
Reduces the heat generated from the first phase of water is added
Can prevent the alkali blocks interaction
Reduces the permeability of cement due to its high smoothness.
Improve the properties of plastics and cohesion (suitable for cement painting).
Thermal insulation (saving electric power for lighting and air conditioners) consumption Noise absorption and helps in sound insulation reduces sound
Increases the fire resistance ability due to the containment Pozzolananational silica and alumina, it can withstand high temperatures.
Health- friendly material is not harmful to the environment natural materials do not contain organic materials and has no smell and does not export.
Resistance to salts construction which carried out on the nearby salt water seashores or rich soil of soluble salts, which do not require bearing high.
Resistance to weather changing with time passing ancient and historical constructions consist of volcanic source rocks, especially very old Romanian.

products.title: Sulphate Resistant Cement
products.description: Sulphate Resisting Portland Cement is a type of Portland cement in which the amount of Tricalcium aluminate (C3A) is restricted to lower than 5 % and (2 C3A + C4AF) is lower than 25%.
products.application: This type of cement is different from the rest of the other types, to distinguish low aluminate content tri-calcium aluminate ratio which is responsible for interaction with the Sulphate ions in the soil or water which prevents volume increasing of concrete and the occurrence of cracks in areas where the soil contains a high proportion of Sulphate.
examples: Concrete pipe exposed to water with a high percentage of Sulphate water marshes and sewage.
Marine works such as ports and platforms.
Bases and foundations that need to withstand high power.
Sewage plants (bases of construction and foundations).

products.title: Tameer Finishing Cement
products.description: TAMEER FINISHING CEMENT (TFC) is a kind of Blended Cement which is produced by inter-grinding of OPC clinker along with gypsum and pozzolanic materials in certain proportions.
products.application: All types and activities of finishing works Plaster, render and grout. Mortar for masonry and repair work.
